name: Sloat: Xiao Qiao
description: Xiao Qiao, the daughter of Qiao Xuan, is a stunning beauty in the Three Kingdoms period. She is more beautiful and beautiful than a fairy. She is known as Er Qiao together with her sister Da Qiao. In the fourth year of Jian'an, she married Zhou Yu. This pair of talented and beautiful women in troubled times was passed down by later generations.
